flavorText: Oona grants her favored subjects a dream from her own guarded heart.

foreignData.flavorText: Oona gewährt ihren liebsten Untertanen einen Traum aus ihrem eigenen, gut bewachten Herzen.
foreignData.name: Oonas Gnade
foreignData.text:
Ein Spieler deiner Wahl zieht eine Karte.
Zurückverfolgen (Du kannst diese Karte aus deinem Friedhof spielen, indem du zusätzlich zu ihren anderen Kosten eine Länderkarte aus deiner Hand abwirfst.)

foreignData.flavorText: Oona le otorga a sus súbditos favoritos un sueño de su propio corazón.
foreignData.name: Gracia de Oona
foreignData.text:
El jugador objetivo roba una carta.
Desandar. (Puedes jugar esta carta desde tu cementerio descartando una carta de tierra además de pagar sus otros costes.)

foreignData.flavorText: Oona accorde à ses sujets préférés un rêve issu de son cœur bien gardé.
foreignData.name: Grâce d'Oona
foreignData.text:
Le joueur ciblé pioche une carte.
Pistage (Vous pouvez jouer cette carte depuis votre cimetière en vous défaussant d'une carte de terrain en plus de payer ses autres coûts.)

foreignData.flavorText: Oona concede ai suoi sudditi preferiti un sogno tratto dal suo cuore protetto.
foreignData.name: Grazia di Oona
foreignData.text:
Un giocatore bersaglio pesca una carta.
Rievocare (Puoi giocare questa carta dal tuo cimitero scartando una carta terra oltre a pagare gli altri suoi costi.)

foreignData.flavorText: ウーナは自分のお気に入りに、堅く守られた自らの心から夢を分け与える。
foreignData.name: ウーナの寵愛
foreignData.text:
プレイヤー１人を対象とする。そのプレイヤーはカードを１枚引く。
回顧 （あなたはこのカードを、それの他のコストの支払いに追加して土地カードを１枚捨てることで、あなたの墓地からプレイしてもよい。）

foreignData.flavorText: Oona concede a seus súditos prediletos um sonho de seu próprio coração resguardado.
foreignData.name: Graça de Oona
foreignData.text:
O jogador alvo compra um card.
Retraçar (Você pode jogar este card de seu cemitério descartando um card de terreno, além de pagar seus outros custos.)

foreignData.flavorText: Избранным подданным Уна дарует сны из собственного охраняемого сердца.
foreignData.name: Благоволение Уны
foreignData.text:
Целевой игрок берет карту.
Возвращение (Вы можете разыграть эту карту из вашего кладбища, сбросив карту земли в дополнение к оплате других ее стоимостей.)

foreignData.flavorText: 欧娜所青睐的对象，都会获赠她重重心防中的一个梦想。
foreignData.name: 欧娜的恩典

目标牌手抓一张牌。
追溯 （你可以从你的坟墓场使用此牌，但必须支付其所需费用，并额外弃掉一张地牌。）

name: Oona's Grace
originalText:
Target player draws a card.
Retrace (You may play this card from your graveyard by discarding a land card in addition to paying its other costs.)

rulings.text: Casting a card by using its retrace ability works just like casting any other spell, with two exceptions: You’re casting it from your graveyard rather than your hand, and you must discard a land card in addition to any other costs.
A retrace card cast from your graveyard follows the normal timing rules for its card type.
When a retrace card you cast from your graveyard resolves, fails to resolve, or is countered, it’s put back into your graveyard. You may use the retrace ability to cast it again.

If the active player casts a spell that has retrace, that player may cast that card again after it resolves, before another player can remove the card from the graveyard. The active player has priority after the spell resolves, so they can immediately cast a new spell. Since casting a card with retrace from the graveyard moves that card onto the stack, no one else would have the chance to affect it while it’s still in the graveyard.
